title: Any similar fonts to Neo Sans and Neo Tech ?
content:
Could anyone tell me if there are any similar fonts to the Neo Sans and Neo Tech family fonts ?

Thank you.
author: ibarbar

comments.content: Well, they _are_ very characteristic, so chances of finding similar fonts are very slim. Why wouldn't you use the actual Neo Sans or Neo Tech faces if you like them so much?

Well it's a bit complicated, since I don't have those specific fonts right now.

But here is another font that looks like the Neo Family and I'd also like to know it's name.

Thanks again.

Some problems with adding the image...

Hope it works now..

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110603061613im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font.jpg)

We had this hand printed script already, but it doesn't look like [Sebastian Lester](http://web.archive.org/web/20110603061613/http:/www.monotypefonts.com/Foundry/DesignerProfiles.asp?show=lester)'s [Neo Sans / Neo Tech](http://web.archive.org/web/20110603061613/http:/www.monotypefonts.com/WhatsNew/Releases.asp?show=neo) family at all. I'm confused now... :^)

I guess its one of 'those' file names, again, Yves.. :)  
_( Edit-A-Bit.: The image is named 'font.jpg'.. Well, I guess there 'might' have been a similar named file, on Typophile, before.? :)_

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20110603061613/http:/www.formlos.net/)
